extension.summary: Stream the most captivating nature and wildlife documentaries and videos shot in stunning Ultra HD (4K) on Smithsonian Earth.
extension.description: Smithsonian Earth is a commercial-free streaming site that offers unlimited access to nature and wildlife documentaries and videos shot in stunning 4K UHD resolution. Refreshed weekly, you'll never run out of things to discover. Subscription costs $3.99 per month with a 30 day free trial.
extension.disclaimer: For support go to my github. No support without a full, unedited debug log. No support at TVAddons or any other forum.
